item.title: Looking Glass’ new lineup includes a $300 phone-sized holographic display
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
The Looking Glass Pro has a 6-inch display and a foldable base. It shows spatial images like those created with the Apple Vision Pro and iPhone 15 Pro.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: TikTok partners with Warner Bros. to become a discovery engine for TV and movies
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description:
TikTok’s latest offering is capitalizing on the app’s ability to serve as a discovery engine for other media — something its users already take advantage of by sharing short clips of movies and TV shows. Today, the company is partnering with studios like Warner Bros. to launch a feature that lets users discover movies and […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Cocoon is transforming steel production runoff into a greener cement alternative
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
Slag is the molten runoff created while producing steel in a traditional blast furnace. The material has been prized as greener cement alternative for creating concrete, the Earth’s most abundant human-made material. The runoff is facing supply chain issues, however, as the steel industry looks to greener methods of production. Increasingly, steel producers in the […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: SoundHound acquires Amelia AI for $80M after it raised $189M+
item.dc:creator: Ingrid Lunden
item.description:
SoundHound, an AI company that makes voice interface tech used by car companies, restaurants and tech firms, is doubling down on enterprise services by playing consolidator in a crowded market. The company said on Thursday that it is acquiring Amelia AI, which makes an AI agent that businesses can customize for internal or customer use. […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Feeling Great’s new therapy app translates its psychologist co-founder’s experience into AI
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
Seeking mental health support is a complex process, but some founders believe that using AI to formalize techniques like Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) can help folks who might not have access to professionals. Dr. David Burns, who has over 40 years of experience in the field of psychiatry, has now built an app, Feeling Great, […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: UK launches formal probe into Amazon’s ties with AI startup Anthropic
item.dc:creator: Paul Sawers
item.description:
The U.K.’s antitrust regulator has confirmed that it’s carrying out a formal antitrust investigation into Amazon’s ties with Anthropic, after Amazon recently completed a $4 billion investment into the AI startup. The news comes a week after the Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) revealed it was launching an invitation to comment into Google’s own ties with […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: AI business agent startup Bardeen pulls in strategic investment from Dropbox and Hubspot
item.dc:creator: Mike Butcher
item.description:
Bardeen has raised $3M to build its platform that uses a natural language interface to automate repetitive knowledge work.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Bilingual dictation assistant Silvia understands ‘Spanglish’ and other language mixtures
item.dc:creator: Devin Coldewey
item.description:
Natural language AI assistants tend to be excellent English speakers, and passable in other tongues — but if you are one of the millions who fluidly switch between two languages on the fly, they’re stumped. A new AI helper called Silvia, however, understands “Spanglish” just fine, with more language combos to come. The app — […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Indian conglomerate Reliance slashed over 42,000 jobs last financial year
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Reliance, India's largest conglomerate, reduced its workforce by 11%, or more than 42,000 people, in the financial year ended March 2024. 

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Anduril raises $1.5B at a $14B valuation
item.dc:creator: Aria Alamalhodaei
item.description:
The Palmer Luckey-founded defense startup wants to become a serious rival to longstanding kingpins, and has been clocking some big wins.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: UK satellite startup Blue Skies Space wants to sell astronomy data ‘as a service’
item.dc:creator: Paul Sawers
item.description:
The satellite is designed to complement data provided by existing astronomical efforts such as that of the famed Hubble Telescope.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: YouTube is testing a feature that lets creators use Google Gemini to brainstorm video ideas
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description:
YouTube is testing an integration with Google Gemini to help creators brainstorm video ideas, titles and thumbnails. The Google-owned company announced the launch of the new Brainstorm with Gemini feature in a video posted to its Creator Insider channel. A YouTube spokesperson told TechCrunch that the feature is available to select creators as a part […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: From Skims to Stripe, here are the startups that are likely — or definitely — not having IPOs this year
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description:
Last year’s investor dreams of a strong 2024 IPO pipeline have faded, if not fully disappeared, as we settle in to the second half of the year. This year delivered four venture-backed tech IPOs — Reddit, Astera Labs, Ibotta and Rubrik — in March and April, which made it seem like this year could spur […]

item.title: Techstars is laying off 17%, ending its J.P. Morgan-backed programs
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description:
Techstars is cutting 17% of its staff and will end its $80 million J.P. Morgan-backed AdvancingCities program once the fund is completely deployed.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Made by Google 2024: How to watch Google unveil the Pixel 9, a new foldable and more
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
Made by Google 2024 kicks off at 10 a.m. PT on August 13. Get ready for a slew of new hardware, including the Pixel 9 and a new foldable.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Newly launched social network Maven loses its co-founders
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description:
Just three months after Maven’s public launch, Kenneth Stanley — the former OpenAI researcher who co-founded the social media platform designed to facilitate serendipitous interactions — is stepping down.  Stanley posted on Maven and X that despite enthusiastic responses to the platform’s launch, Maven “could not achieve the kind of growth curve that investors want […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: ChatGPT’s mobile app just had its biggest month yet
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description:
With the arrival of ChatGPT's new Advanced Voice Mode, which offers nearly real-time, realistic interactions, Appfigures expects growth to continue in the months to come.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: UK’s internet regulator warns social media platforms over risks of inciting violence
item.dc:creator: Natasha Lomas
item.description:
The U.K.'s internet regulator Ofcom has published an open letter to social media platforms raising concerns about the use of their tools being used to incite violence.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Keychron’s K2 HE turns magnets and wood into an affordable mechanical keyboard
item.dc:creator: Frederic Lardinois
item.description:
The $79 K2 has long been one of Keychron’s bestselling mechanical keyboards. As with all of the company’s K-line boards, it offers a relatively no-frills experience but provides all of the advantages of a mechanical keyboard in an affordable package with a 75% layout (which means you get arrow keys and a row of function […]

item.title: Facebook creators have a new way to avoid ‘jail’
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description:
Facebook creators are being given a new option that will help them avoid jail — “Facebook jail,” that is — upon their first violation, and at various times after. In a revised policy, announced on Wednesday, social networking giant Meta said that creators who violate the company’s Community Standards for the first time will be […]
